https://brag.charity is an E-Commerce Site.

 

brag.charity is a digital marketplace in support of STEM/STEAM education. brag.charity offers digital items for purchase as a fundraising program for the Digital Education and Safety Foundation.

Your use of https://brag.charity is subject to brag.charity's Privacy Policy. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs the Site and informs users of our data collection practices.

If you are under the age of thirteen, you must ask your parent or guardian for permission to use this website. If you are a parent and you have questions regarding our data collection practices, please contact us using the information provided at the end of this Agreement. If you are under 18, you may use https://brag.charity only with permission of a parent or guardian.
